txt.en: This small village is quite rustic
Homesteads of Rohan
Talk to Seleflad
Visit one of the houses in the Kingstead neighbourhood
Visit the Rohan Kingstead Neighbourhoods
Visit one of the houses in the Eastfold Homesteads
Visit the Rohan Eastfold Homesteads
Visit one of the mead halls in the Kingstead neighbourhoods
Visit the Kingstead Neighbourhood's town centre

'Good [placeholder], you seem a well-travelled one, I dare say! Surely you are aware of what has passed in these troubling times - and that from trouble may come opportunity? Many Rohirrim prepare for battle and have abandoned their homes upon the plains and within the foothills.\n\n'These soldiers have made no plans to return, so have put their homes up for sale! If you wished to, you could own one. But why should my blustery words persuade you? You should see these homesteads for yourself! If you do so, I shall not be far from either the Rohan Kingstead or the Rohan Eastfold Homesteads. We shall speak again soon. I am sure of it.'
Visit the Eastfold Homestead's town centre
Visit one of the mead halls in the Eastfold Homesteads
'I knew we would meet again! Did the traveller find a house they desire? Yes, I am sure more than one of them caught your eye!'
Burginda can be found at Edoras or the Kingstead neighbourhoods. Seleflad can be found at Edoras or the Eastfold Homesteads.\n\nYou should talk to Burginda or Seleflad.

'Good [placeholder], you seem a well-travelled one, I dare say! Surely you are aware of what has passed in these troubling times - and that from trouble may come opportunity?  Many Rohirrim prepare for battle and have abandoned their homes upon the plains and within the foothills.\n\n'These soldiers have made no plans to return, so have put their homes up for sale! If you wished to, you could own one. But why should my blustery words persuade you? You should see these homesteads for yourself! If you do so, I shall not be far from either the Rohan Kingstead or the Rohan Eastfold Homesteads. We shall speak again soon. I am sure of it.'
Rohan is in need of farmers and pioneers. The Rohan housing broker has suggested you might take the opportunity to purchase your own home in Rohan.
'I knew we would meet again! Did the traveller find a house they desire? Yes, I am sure more than one of them caught your eye!'
This house is most impressive

This mead hall is most impressive
This mead hall is most impressive
The Kingstead and Eastfold Homesteads can be found in Rohan.\n\nYou should visit and explore the Kingstead and Eastfold Homesteads.
Talk to Burginda
The homes are arranged in a circle around the mead hall
